name: Unauthorized Access
dataAffected: All sensitive information stored in the database

name: SQL Injection
dataAffected: Any data in the database vulnerable to manipulation

name: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
dataAffected: User sessions, personal information

name: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
dataAffected: Any action a user can perform within the application

name: Data Breach
dataAffected: Personally Identifiable Information (PII), financial data

name: Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) Attacks
dataAffected: Any data transmitted between the application and users

name: Denial of Service (DoS) Attacks
dataAffected: Availability of the application and its services

name: Phishing Attacks
dataAffected: User credentials, personal information

name: Brute Force Attacks
dataAffected: User account credentials

name: Insider Threats
dataAffected: Any sensitive data accessible by insiders

name: Eavesdropping
dataAffected: Any data transmitted over networks

name: Malware
dataAffected: Any data accessible by the compromised system

name: Zero-Day Exploits
dataAffected: Any data accessible by exploiting vulnerabilities

name: Session Hijacking
dataAffected: User sessions, sensitive transactions

name: DNS Spoofing
dataAffected: User interactions, potentially sensitive information

name: File Inclusion Exploits
dataAffected: Any data accessible through included files

name: API Security Issues
dataAffected: Any data exposed or manipulated through APIs

name: Data Loss
dataAffected: Any sensitive data stored in the database

name: Insecure Direct Object References (IDOR)
dataAffected: Any data accessible through object references

name: Unvalidated Redirects and Forwards
dataAffected: User interactions, potentially sensitive information
